Figure 3:Performance of various LLMs across characters of different moral levels, ranging from moral paragons (Level 1) to pure villains (Level 4). The figure shows that as character morality decreases, most models demonstrate a notable drop in role-playing quality, revealinga consistent challenge across models in convincingly portraying morally ambiguous or evil personas.
